alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Orange; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Seminole, northeastern Lake, northwestern Brevard, southeastern Orange and Volusia Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 129 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crescent City to near DeLand Airport to near Sanford to Avalon Park. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Deltona, Daytona Beach, Port Orange, Sanford, Oviedo, Winter Springs, DeLand, New Smyrna Beach, Lake Mary, Orange City, Wedgefield, Lake Helen, Pierson, Barberville, Lake Jessup, Avalon Park, Chuluota, DeLeon Springs, DeBary and Bithlo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Orange; Seminole
